def Load(widget): import clr from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BennerContext
podeVer = clr.Reference[bool]() podeInserir = clr.Reference[bool]() podeEditar = clr.Reference[bool]() podeExcluir = clr.Reference[bool]()
BennerContext.Authorization.GetDefaultOperationPermission(widget.View, podeVer, podeInserir, podeEditar, podeExcluir)
widget.View.Commands["CMD_NOVO"].Visible = podeInserir.Value
